channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Review cites gaps in 106-unit Strawberry senior-care plan as clock ticks
item.description: Inconsistencies must be resolved by early January, though developers say the setback is routine and will not derail the project.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Tiburon to explore Bramble Beach for kayak launch
item.description: While Bramble Beach is being evaluated for the first time, the launch has been a longtime desire of residents and officials.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Celebration, mourning in Tiburon as Hanukkah begins
item.description: Chabad of Tiburon’s Dec. 14 Hanukkah celebration in downtown Tiburon took a somber turn after a deadly terror attack in Australia.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: Belvedere-Tiburon Landmarks Society and neighbors reach deal over Art & Garden events
item.description: The agreement limits Landmarks to 16 total events annually between March and November — 14 of them with amplified noise.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Steve McNamara was part-owner of The Ark, longtime owner of Pacific Sun
item.description: Steve McNamara died of natural causes Nov. 24 at his home in Mill Valley. He was 91.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Grant brings expert Chinese calligrapher to classrooms at Bel Aire school
item.description: Hundreds of Bel Aire students spent three days the week of Dec. 1 learning the 3,000-year-old art of Chinese calligraphy.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Everyday Encounters: An artist’s work inspires her to highlight the positives in life
item.description: Painter, appraiser and teacher Helen Werngren creates her art at Sausalito’s Industrial Center Building.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Wilkinson returns as Belvedere mayor with Beach Road, fire service priorities
item.description: The Belvedere City Council voted unanimously Dec. 8 to make Councilmember Sally Wilkinson mayor and colleague Kevin Burke vice mayor.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Garden Plot: Find unique gifts for gardeners at local shops, nurseries
item.description: There are many interesting things out there for the gardener in your life.
item.dc:creator: Diane Lynch
